Description: Necklace: a string composed of disc beads, some of green glazed composition, others of blue, two mottled black and white syenite discs and one shell disc.
Dimensions: Diameter: 2.10 centimetres (total height of two rows, as in picture)
Curator's comments: Bibliography: F. Ll. Griffith, 'Liverpool Annals of Archaeology and Anthropology 8 (Liverpool, 1921), 75, describes C-Group jewellery from this cemetery without specific mention of this burial.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (377)
